en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 20,000 To Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 20,000 ( Cash and Quantum Science Products) to the Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation. At FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner at PGRM on the 08th August 2009, FusionExcel's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee presented a mock up cheque to YB Dato Hoh Hee Lee, VP of the Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation.

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 20,000 ( Cash and Quantum Science Products) to the Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball Federation.
meta.author: klhunter
